verses.verse: And <WG2532> he went out<WG1831> from thence,<WG1564> and<WG2532> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> his own<WG848> country;<WG3968> and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> follow<WG190> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> when the sabbath day<WG4521> was come,<WG1096> he began<WG756> to teach<WG1321> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> synagogue:<WG4864> and<WG2532> many<WG4183> hearing<WG191> him were astonished,<WG1605> saying,<WG3004> From whence<WG4159> hath this<WG5129> man these things?<WG5023> and<WG2532> what<WG5101> wisdom<WG4678> is this which is given<WG1325> unto him,<WG846> that<WG3754> even<WG2532> such<WG5108> mighty works<WG1411> are wrought<WG1096> by<WG1223> his<WG846> hands?<WG5495>

Is <WG2076> not<WG3756> this<WG3778> the<WG3588> carpenter,<WG5045> the<WG3588> son<WG5207> of Mary,<WG3137> the<WG1161> brother<WG80> of James,<WG2385> and<WG2532> Joses,<WG2500> and<WG2532> of Juda,<WG2455> and<WG2532> Simon?<WG4613> and<WG2532> are<WG1526> not<WG3756> his<WG846> sisters<WG79> here<WG5602> with<WG4314> us?<WG2248> And<WG2532> they were offended<WG4624> at<WG1722> him.<WG846>

But <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> A prophet<WG4396> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> without honor,<WG820> but<WG1508> in<WG1722> his own<WG848> country,<WG3968> and<WG2532> among<WG1722> his own kin,<WG4773> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> his own<WG848> house. <WG3614>

And <WG2532> he could<WG1410> there<WG1563> do<WG4160> no<WG3756> mighty work,<WG1411> save that<WG1508> he laid his hands upon<WG2007> <WG5495> a few<WG3641> sick folk,<WG732> and healed<WG2323> them.
And <WG2532> he marveled<WG2296> because<WG1223> of their<WG846> unbelief.<WG570> And<WG2532> he went<WG4013> round about<WG2945> the<WG3588> villages,<WG2968> teaching.<WG1321>

And <WG2532> he called<WG4341> unto him the<WG3588> twelve,<WG1427> and<WG2532> began<WG756> to send them forth<WG649> <WG846> by two and two;<WG1417> <WG1417> and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> them<WG846> power<WG1849> over unclean<WG169> spirits;<WG4151>

And <WG2532> commanded<WG3853> them<WG846> that<WG2443> they should take<WG142> nothing<WG3367> for<WG1519> their journey,<WG3598> save<WG1508> a staff<WG4464> only;<WG3440> no<WG3361> scrip,<WG4082> no<WG3361> bread,<WG740> no<WG3361> money<WG5475> in<WG1519> their purse;<WG2223>
But <WG235> be shod<WG5265> with sandals;<WG4547> and<WG2532> not<WG3361> put on<WG1746> two<WG1417> coats.<WG5509>

And <WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> In what place soever <WG3699> <WG1437> ye enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> a house,<WG3614> there<WG1563> abide<WG3306> till <WG2193> <WG302> ye depart<WG1831> from that place. <WG1564>

And <WG2532> whosoever <WG3745> <WG302> shall not<WG3361> receive<WG1209> you,<WG5209> nor<WG3366> hear<WG191> you,<WG5216> when ye depart<WG1607> thence,<WG1564> shake off<WG1621> the<WG3588> dust<WG5522> under<WG5270> your<WG5216> feet<WG4228> for<WG1519> a testimony<WG3142> against them.<WG846> Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> It shall be<WG2071> more tolerable<WG414> for Sodom<WG4670> and<WG2228> Gomorrah<WG1116> in<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of judgment,<WG2920> than<WG2228> for that<WG1565> city. <WG4172>
And <WG2532> they went out,<WG1831> and preached<WG2784> that<WG2443> men should repent.<WG3340>
And <WG2532> they cast out<WG1544> many<WG4183> devils,<WG1140> and<WG2532> anointed<WG218> with oil<WG1637> many<WG4183> that were sick,<WG732> and<WG2532> healed<WG2323> them.

And <WG2532> king<WG935> Herod<WG2264> heard<WG191> of him; (for<WG1063> his<WG846> name<WG3686> was spread abroad: )<WG1096> <WG5318> and<WG2532> he said,<WG3004> That<WG3754> John<WG2491> the<WG3588> Baptist<WG907> was risen<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> and<WG2532> therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> mighty works<WG1411> do show forth<WG1754> themselves in<WG1722> him.<WG846>

Others <WG243> said,<WG3004> That<WG3754> it is<WG2076> Elijah.<WG2243> And<WG1161> others<WG243> said,<WG3004> That<WG3754> it is<WG2076> a prophet,<WG4396> or<WG2228> as<WG5613> one<WG1520> of the<WG3588> prophets.<WG4396>

But <WG1161> when Herod<WG2264> heard<WG191> thereof, he said,<WG2036> It<WG3778> is<WG2076> John,<WG2491> whom<WG3739> I<WG1473> beheaded:<WG607> he<WG846> is risen<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead.<WG3498>

For <WG1063> Herod<WG2264> himself<WG846> had sent forth<WG649> and<WG2532> laid hold upon<WG2902> John,<WG2491> and<WG2532> bound<WG1210> him<WG846> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438> for Herodias' sake,<WG1223> <WG2266> his<WG848> brother<WG80> Philip's<WG5376> wife:<WG1135> for<WG3754> he had married<WG1060> her.<WG846>
For <WG1063> John<WG2491> had said<WG3004> unto Herod,<WG2264> It is not lawful<WG1832> <WG3756> for thee<WG4671> to have<WG2192> thy<WG4675> brother's<WG80> wife.<WG1135>
Therefore <WG1161> Herodias<WG2266> had a quarrel against<WG1758> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> would<WG2309> have killed<WG615> him;<WG846> but<WG2532> she could<WG1410> not: <WG3756>

For <WG1063> Herod<WG2264> feared<WG5399> John,<WG2491> knowing<WG1492> that he<WG846> was a just<WG1342> man<WG435> and<WG2532> a holy,<WG40> and<WG2532> observed<WG4933> him;<WG846> and<WG2532> when he heard<WG191> him,<WG846> he did<WG4160> many things,<WG4183> and<WG2532> heard<WG191> him<WG846> gladly.<WG2234>

And <WG2532> when a convenient<WG2121> day<WG2250> was come,<WG2064> that<WG3753> Herod<WG2264> on his<WG848> birthday<WG1077> made<WG4160> a supper<WG1173> to his<WG848> lords,<WG3175> <WG2532> high captains,<WG5506> and<WG2532> chief<WG4413> estates of Galilee;<WG1056>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> daughter<WG2364> of the said<WG846> Herodias<WG2266> came in,<WG1525> and<WG2532> danced,<WG3738> and<WG2532> pleased<WG700> Herod<WG2264> and<WG2532> them that sat with<WG4873> him, the<WG3588> king<WG935> said<WG2036> unto the<WG3588> damsel,<WG2877> Ask<WG154> of me<WG3165> whatsoever<WG3739> <WG1437> thou wilt,<WG2309> and<WG2532> I will give<WG1325> it thee.<WG4671>

And <WG2532> he swore<WG3660> unto her,<WG846> Whatsoever<WG3739> <WG1437> thou shalt ask<WG154> of me,<WG3165> I will give<WG1325> it thee,<WG4671> unto<WG2193> the half<WG2255> of my<WG3450> kingdom.<WG932>

And <WG1161> she<WG3588> went forth,<WG1831> and said<WG2036> unto her<WG848> mother,<WG3384> What<WG5101> shall I ask?<WG154> And<WG1161> she<WG3588> said,<WG2036> The<WG3588> head<WG2776> of John<WG2491> the<WG3588> Baptist.<WG910>

And <WG2532> she came in<WG1525> straightway<WG2112> with<WG3326> haste<WG4710> unto<WG4314> the<WG3588> king,<WG935> and asked,<WG154> saying,<WG3004> I will<WG2309> that<WG2443> thou give<WG1325> me<WG3427> by and by<WG1824> in<WG1909> a charger<WG4094> the<WG3588> head<WG2776> of John<WG2491> the<WG3588> Baptist.<WG910>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> king<WG935> was<WG1096> exceeding sorry;<WG4036> yet for his oath's sake,<WG1223> <WG3727> and<WG2532> for their sakes which sat with<WG4873> him, he would<WG2309> not<WG3756> reject<WG114> her.<WG846>

And <WG2532> immediately<WG2112> the<WG3588> king<WG935> sent<WG649> an executioner,<WG4688> and commanded<WG2004> his<WG846> head<WG2776> to be brought:<WG5342> and<WG1161> he<WG3588> went<WG565> and beheaded<WG607> him<WG846> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> prison,<WG5438>

And <WG2532> brought<WG5342> his<WG846> head<WG2776> in<WG1909> a charger,<WG4094> and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> it<WG846> to the<WG3588> damsel:<WG2877> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> damsel<WG2877> gave<WG1325> it<WG846> to her<WG848> mother.<WG3384>

And <WG2532> when his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> heard<WG191> of it, they came<WG2064> and<WG2532> took up<WG142> his<WG846> corpse,<WG4430> and<WG2532> laid<WG5087> it<WG846> in<WG1722> a tomb.<WG3419>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> apostles<WG652> gathered themselves together<WG4863> unto<WG4314> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> told<WG518> him<WG846> all things,<WG3956> both<WG2532> what<WG3745> they had done,<WG4160> and<WG2532> what<WG3745> they had taught.<WG1321>

And <WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Come <WG1205> ye<WG5210> yourselves<WG846> apart <WG2596> <WG2398> into <WG1519> a desert<WG2048> place,<WG5117> and<WG2532> rest<WG373> a while: <WG3641> for<WG1063> there were<WG2258> many<WG4183> coming<WG2064> and<WG2532> going,<WG5217> and<WG2532> they had no leisure so much as<WG2119> <WG3761> to eat.<WG5315>
And <WG2532> they departed<WG565> into<WG1519> a desert<WG2048> place<WG5117> by ship<WG4143> privately.<WG2596> <WG2398>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> people<WG3793> saw<WG1492> them<WG846> departing,<WG5217> and<WG2532> many<WG4183> knew<WG1921> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> ran<WG4936> afoot<WG3979> thither<WG1563> out of<WG575> all<WG3956> cities,<WG4172> and<WG2532> outwent<WG4281> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> came together<WG4905> unto<WG4314> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> Jesus,<WG2424> when he came out,<WG1831> saw<WG1492> much<WG4183> people,<WG3793> and<WG2532> was moved with compassion<WG4697> toward<WG1909> them,<WG846> because<WG3754> they were<WG2258> as<WG5613> sheep<WG4263> not<WG3361> having<WG2192> a shepherd:<WG4166> and<WG2532> he began<WG756> to teach<WG1321> them<WG846> many things.<WG4183>

And <WG2532> when the day was now far spent,<WG2235> <WG1096> <WG4183> <WG5610> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> came<WG4334> unto him,<WG846> and said,<WG3004> This is<WG2076> a desert<WG2048> place,<WG5117> and<WG2532> now<WG2235> the time is far passed:<WG4183> <WG5610>

Send them away,<WG630> <WG846> that<WG2443> they may go<WG565> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> country<WG68> round about,<WG2945> and<WG2532> into the villages,<WG2968> and buy<WG59> themselves<WG1438> bread:<WG740> for<WG1063> they have<WG2192> nothing<WG3756> <WG5101> to eat.<WG5315>

<WG1161> He<WG3588> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Give <WG1325> ye<WG5210> them<WG846> to eat. And<WG5315> they<WG2532> say<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> Shall we go<WG565> and buy<WG59> two hundred<WG1250> pennyworth<WG1220> of bread,<WG740> and<WG2532> give<WG1325> them<WG846> to eat?<WG5315>

<WG1161> He<WG3588> saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> How many<WG4214> loaves<WG740> have<WG2192> ye? go<WG5217> and<WG2532> see. <WG1492> And<WG2532> when they knew,<WG1097> they say,<WG3004> Five,<WG4002> and<WG2532> two<WG1417> fishes.<WG2486>
And <WG2532> he commanded<WG2004> them<WG846> to make all sit down<WG347> <WG3956> by companies<WG4849> <WG4849> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> green<WG5515> grass.<WG5528>
And <WG2532> they sat down<WG377> in ranks,<WG4237> <WG4237> by hundreds,<WG303> <WG1540> and<WG2532> by fifties.<WG303> <WG4004>

And <WG2532> when he had taken<WG2983> the<WG3588> five<WG4002> loaves<WG740> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> two<WG1417> fishes,<WG2486> he looked up<WG308> to<WG1519> heaven,<WG3772> and blessed,<WG2127> and<WG2532> broke<WG2622> the<WG3588> loaves,<WG740> and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> them to his<WG848> disciples<WG3101> to<WG2443> set before<WG3908> them;<WG846> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> two<WG1417> fishes<WG2486> divided<WG3307> he among them all.<WG3956>
And <WG2532> they did all<WG3956> eat,<WG5315> and<WG2532> were filled.<WG5526>
And <WG2532> they took up<WG142> twelve<WG1427> baskets<WG2894> full<WG4134> of the fragments,<WG2801> and<WG2532> of<WG575> the<WG3588> fishes.<WG2486>
And <WG2532> they that did eat<WG5315> of the<WG3588> loaves<WG740> were<WG2258> about<WG5616> five thousand<WG4000> men.<WG435>

And <WG2532> straightway<WG2112> he constrained<WG315> his<WG848> disciples<WG3101> to get<WG1684> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> ship,<WG4143> and<WG2532> to go to the other side<WG4254> <WG1519> <WG4008> before<WG4314> unto Bethsaida,<WG966> while<WG2193> he<WG846> sent away<WG630> the<WG3588> people.<WG3793>
And <WG2532> when he had sent them away,<WG657> <WG846> he departed<WG565> into<WG1519> a mountain<WG3735> to pray.<WG4336>

And <WG2532> when even<WG3798> was come,<WG1096> the<WG3588> ship<WG4143> was<WG2258> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> and<WG2532> he<WG846> alone<WG3441> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> land.<WG1093>

And <WG2532> he saw<WG1492> them<WG846> toiling<WG928> in rowing;<WG1643> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> wind<WG417> was<WG2258> contrary<WG1727> unto them:<WG846> and<WG2532> about<WG4012> the fourth<WG5067> watch<WG5438> of the<WG3588> night<WG3571> he cometh<WG2064> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> walking<WG4043> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> and<WG2532> would<WG2309> have passed by<WG3928> them.<WG846>
But <WG1161> when they<WG3588> saw<WG1492> him<WG846> walking<WG4043> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> they supposed<WG1380> it had been<WG1511> a spirit,<WG5326> and<WG2532> cried out: <WG349>

For <WG1063> they all<WG3956> saw<WG1492> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> were troubled.<WG5015> And<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> he talked<WG2980> with<WG3326> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Be of good cheer: <WG2293> it is<WG1510> I;<WG1473> be not afraid. <WG5399> <WG3361>

And <WG2532> he went up<WG305> unto<WG4314> them<WG846> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> ship;<WG4143> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> wind<WG417> ceased:<WG2869> and<WG2532> they were sore<WG3029> amazed<WG1839> in<WG1722> themselves<WG1438> beyond<WG1537> measure,<WG4053> and<WG2532> wondered.<WG2296>
For <WG1063> they considered<WG4920> not<WG3756> the miracle of<WG1909> the<WG3588> loaves:<WG740> for<WG1063> their<WG846> heart<WG2588> was<WG2258> hardened.<WG4456>
And <WG2532> when they had passed over,<WG1276> they came<WG2064> into<WG1909> the<WG3588> land<WG1093> of Gennesaret,<WG1082> and<WG2532> drew to the shore.<WG4358>
And <WG2532> when they<WG846> were come<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> ship,<WG4143> straightway<WG2112> they knew<WG1921> him,<WG846>

And ran through<WG4063> that<WG1565> whole<WG3650> region round about,<WG4066> and began<WG756> to carry about<WG4064> in<WG1909> beds<WG2895> those that were sick,<WG2192> <WG2560> where<WG3699> they heard<WG191> he<WG3754> was.<WG2076> <WG1563>

And <WG2532> whithersoever<WG3699> <WG302> he entered,<WG1531> into<WG1519> villages,<WG2968> or<WG2228> cities,<WG4172> or<WG2228> country,<WG68> they laid<WG5087> the<WG3588> sick<WG770> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> streets,<WG58> and<WG2532> besought<WG3870> him<WG846> that<WG2443> they might touch<WG680> if it were but<WG2579> the<WG3588> border<WG2899> of his<WG846> garment:<WG2440> and<WG2532> as many as<WG3745> <WG302> touched<WG680> him<WG846> were made whole.<WG4982>
